participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and curious, with a love for adventure and creativity.
participant_1.background: I hate school. I have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. I am a 12 year old girl. I love to play pobox.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and ambitious, with a strong desire to achieve big dreams.
participant_2.background: I was raised on a horse farm. I am from a small town. My family has raised horses for generations. I want to be a lawyer. I dream of moving to the city.
